title: Upgraded stainless steel appliance package by Samsung
posting_body: ['THE MAC LIFE', 'Welcome to The MAC.', 'Located in the historic Temescal neighborhood of Oakland across from the MacArthur BART station, it’s close to the Bay’s major work centers and has plenty to do just down the street.', 'It’s a place where you can do as much, or as little, as you want and get anywhere you need to be — fast.', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 32', 'OR Text', '32', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text us.', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1.5 Bath, approximately 563-618 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Gourmet kitchen', '- Charging outlets with USB ports', '- Subway tile backsplashes', '- Pet-friendly', '- Full-size, in-unit, stackable washer/dryer', '- Wood-inspired plank flooring', '- Large picture windows with views*', '- Breakfast bar*', '- Dual pane tilt windows', '- Energy efficient appliances and heating', '- Spacious walk-in closets', '- Private balconies with glass railings*', '- Fiber internet', '- Upgraded stainless steel appliance package by Samsung', '- Quartz countertops', '*in select units', 'Community Amenities', '- Coffee lounge with Wi-Fi', '- Package service with mobile alerts', '- Professional pet grooming station', '- Custom bike workshop with maintenance station + abundant storage', '- Reserved parking with keyless entry', '- Virtual Fitness + Yoga studio', '- Expansive swimming pool', '- HDTV living room surrounded by entertainment solutions', '- Outdoor dog run', '- State of the art fitness center with cardio + free weights', '- Immediate access to AC Transit and BART', '- Large spa on pool deck', '- Onsite car-sharing service', '- Terrace with grilling pavilion and views of Oakland and Berkeley Hills', '- Pool-side, resort-style seating and private barbecue area', '- Fire-side lounge', '- Skydeck with views of the SF skyline', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly, contact us for details.', 'Driving Directions', 'From 101: Take I-80 E to W MacArthur Blvd in Alameda County.', 'Take the MacArthur Blvd exit from I-580 E, Continue on W MacArthur Blvd.', 'Drive to 39th St.', 'From: 24 Freeway', 'Keep left at the fork to stay on CA-24 W', 'Take the Telegraph Avenue exit toward West Grand Avenue/Interstate 580', 'Turn left onto Telegraph Ave', 'Turn right onto 39th St', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Sunday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'MacArthur Commons', '540 39th Street, Oakland, CA, 94609', 'a0e63HZbF']
